title: Pro Bike Check: Matt Stuttard’s Privateer 161 EWS Race Bike, plus E-161 updates!
content:
A few weeks back at Ard Rock, Matt Stuttard’s Privateer 161 EWS race bike caught our attention, hanging out at the HUNT wheels stand. Matt wasn’t racing of course. After having posted an impressive 16th place at La Thuile EWS, Matt’s luck went south when a crash left him with his collarbone in two pieces. […]

The post Pro Bike Check: Matt Stuttard’s Privateer 161 EWS Race Bike, plus E-161 updates! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
